cab.content: 1 243Miiitjary Secret. 1324/'Vom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary oj State for India, 12th March 1920.3367. 12th March. Malleson telegraphs 9th March :-" One stage from Herat my agent met on 1st March a man from Kabul bound for Kushk with the Suritz mails in an oilcloth covered box. Not long after this some Afghan non-commissioned officers arrived from the Governor of Herat, with written orders to seize Snritz mails, and convey hack to Herat." J -it
